Meta.title: Remove Faith Limit For Faction Equipment Personal Version
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod会在你装备非对应信仰[神器]时, 将[神器]的[派系词条]转换为[普通词条] 并且在解除装备时将会恢复原始状态 同时非对应信仰的[派系词条]会显示为(个人)
略微不同于 'God Artifact Limit Remove' 此mod不会尝试让队友获得非对应信仰的[派系词条]效果 如有特殊需求请订阅 'God Artifact Limit Remove' id=3364742845 或 'Remove Faith Limit for Faction Equipment' id=3366811232
！！！注意: 安装/卸载 此mod时请先确保玩家及友军身上任何有派系效果的装备已被脱下, 避免潜在的属性错误隐患！！！
This mod converts the [Faction Effects] of [God Artifacts] to [Normal Effects] when used with an incorrect faith And restores them to their original state upon unequipping. Additionally, incorrect faith [Faction Effects] will be displayed as (Personal).
Unlike 'God Artifact Limit Remove' this mod does not attempt to grant incorrect faith [Faction Effects] to teammates. If you have special needs, please subscribe to 'God Artifact Limit Remove' id=3364742845 or 'Remove Faith Limit for Faction Equipment' id=3366811232
!!!WARNING: When installing/uninstalling this mod, please ensure that any equipment with faction effects on the player and allies has been unequipped to avoid potential attribute errors!!!
